meanings.definition: To remove ash or ashes from something.
meanings.sent1: She was asing the fireplace after the fire went out.
meanings.sent2: He always enjoys asing the grill after a barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried asing the campfire, thinking it was a giant litter box.
meanings.sent4: The wind was asing the burnt remains of the forest, carrying them away.
meanings.sent5: The gardener was asing the flowerbed, preparing it for new plants.

meanings.definition: The act of removing ash or ashes from something.
meanings.sent1: The asing of the fireplace was a messy task.
meanings.sent2: After the bonfire, everyone helped with the asing.
meanings.sent3: The asing of the volcano was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The asing of the old documents revealed hidden secrets.
meanings.sent5: The asing of the chimney was necessary to prevent a fire hazard.
